name: Summer Slow Jams 2021 - Haunted Theater
description:
Made for Pigsquads first summer slow-jam of 2021, with the technical theme of Exploration, and the creative theme of Forgotten places. 

I decided I wanted to have the player explore a theater for this project, and that I wanted to make a 2.5 d game. I attempted to make everyone but the player (the cat) a ghost, but it's not particularly apparent. I might add some abandoned back rooms to achieve the forgotten places theme. 

As far as gameplay goes, you find all the things in the theater. (which is 3 things right now, not including the music you "steal" from the band) I'm hoping to expand this, with more rooms, and more places to explore.

I forgot to add a control scheme in game so I'll add it here:

WASD to move

E to see your progress screen

Escape to see the pause menu

You use your mouse for the rest of the UI.

Enjoy! 

There are four different things you can go find in the level, which makes for a 2-5 minute playtime.  (One of the things doesn't have an icon that shows you that you can click on it, you can.)

Hope you enjoy the whole 5 minutes of playtime!
